description: As much fun as it is to trudge through the endless desert, you are relieved to come across an oasis of desert racers. Why not try a little desert racing yourself?

puzzles.description: Make Dash turn on red lights when the top button is pressed.
puzzles.introduction: Red means stop, but Dash is ready to let loose!

hints.description: Link the state with a Top Button Pressed cue.

puzzles.description: After turning on red lights, make Dash automatically take off.

hints.description: Link the state with an Auto cue.

puzzles.description: After taking off, make Dash turn on green lights when the top button is released. Then make Dash automatically play the tire squeal sound.
puzzles.introduction: Green means go, and look at Dash go!

hints.description: Link the states with a Top Button Released cue and an Auto cue.

puzzles.description: After playing the tire squeal sound, make Dash instantly move forward with both wheels set to 80 cm/s.
puzzles.introduction: Let's see how fast Desert Dash can go!

hints.description: Drag out a Moving Basics state. Set both wheels to 80 cm/s in the forward direction. Link the state with an Instant cue.
